column4: Does anyone know of a JWPlayer channel, or a place I can get help with it?
try #jwplayer
Aye. I did, but there's nobody in there.
Then ask your question here
Alright. Thanks.
Do you know of a way to make JWPlayer work in the other browsers with my OGV file?
No, wth is JWPlayer?
Do you have an alternative suggestion for a player?
VLC?
So, after installing VLC, I'd just navigate to the location of the video file on the website and it'll play it?
I think, I dont know much about that.
Hmm. I just tried that, and all it did was download it, not play it. Thanks for the help anyway though. :)
k.
You want to play that video?
I'd like it to play in other browsers, yes. It works fine for me in Chromium, but fails for all others, it seems.
I think its related to browser plugins.
Ummm... there was a website that allows long videos. I just dont remember it.

The problem with putting it onto a hosting site is that it'll like have to be converted to FLV... and I don't want to lose much quality, since it has a lot of text people have to read and it blurs easily with a format conversion.
Did you make that video?
It's my video, yes.
It works ok on opera
Any luck with fF?
It doesnt support ogv.
Firefox, or JWPlayer?
